name: Biryani
description: A flavorful rice dish made with meat (chicken, beef, or lamb), vegetables, and spices.

name: Haleem
description: A hearty stew made with a mix of lentils, meat (beef, lamb, or chicken), and spices.

name: Fuchka
description: A popular street food snack made with small, crispy fried shells filled with spiced potatoes, chickpeas, and tamarind chutney.

name: Rasgulla
description: A classic Bangladeshi dessert made with cheese balls soaked in syrup.

name: Pitha
description: A type of cake made with rice flour and coconut milk, often filled with sweet or savory ingredients.

name: Chapati
description: A simple flatbread made from wheat flour and water, commonly served with curries or other dishes.
